summary: Now you can craft black soul gems!
descriptionHtml:
Craft black soul gems at any forge, under the \"Misc\" category. Use grand soul gems and daedra hearts to create regular black soul gems and filled grand soul gems and daedra hearts to create filled black soul gems! 

Note: Also requires Enchantment perk, level 2.

Be sure to subscribe to this mod on Steam Workshop if you like it, and please leave a comment or suggestion - it\'s always appreciated!
author: Tasciovanus
